TopicTitle: Game crashing during re-entry from orbit.

Articles.Content:
My game is crashing to desktop every time I try re-entry from an orbit with one of my ships, doesn't seem to matter where I try to land but once I come close to reaching the surface it crashes every time.

On Windows 7.
Are there a lot of the temperature guages showing up on parts when this happens? If so, press F10 to disable them. There's a major memory leak with them which can cause the game to crash.
Yep, that fixed it! Thanks a bunch duder.
